title: Complete TypeScript Fundamentals Course
description: Finish all modules of the TypeScript fundamentals course including types, interfaces, and generics

title: Setup Development Environment
description: Install and configure VS Code, Node.js, and TypeScript compiler for the project

title: Create User Authentication System
description: Implement login, registration, and password reset functionality with JWT tokens

title: Write Unit Tests
description: Create comprehensive unit tests for all utility functions and components

title: Update Documentation
description: Update README.md with installation instructions and API documentation

title: Implement Database Schema
description: Design and create database tables for users, posts, and comments

title: Code Review Session
description: Review pull requests and provide feedback to team members

title: Performance Optimization
description: Optimize database queries and implement caching for better application performance

title: Deploy to Production
description: Set up CI/CD pipeline and deploy the application to production environment

title: Security Audit
description: Conduct security audit and implement necessary security measures
